statements: SELECT * FROM Influential_Users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, username FROM Influential_Users WHERE followers_count > 1000;
SELECT username, interactions_count FROM Influential_Users WHERE followers_count > 500 ORDER BY interactions_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Influential_Users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY followers_count ASC;
SELECT user_id, followers_count, interactions_count FROM Influential_Users WHERE followers_count > 2000 AND interactions_count > 1500;
SELECT * FROM Influential_Users WHERE followers_count > 1000 ORDER BY interactions_count DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM Influential_Users WHERE interactions_count BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Influential_Users WHERE followers_count < 500;
SELECT * FROM Influential_Users WHERE followers_count > 2000 AND interactions_count < 500 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT username FROM Influential_Users WHERE followers_count > 1500 ORDER BY followers_count DESC, interactions_count ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, followers_count FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, followers_count FROM users WHERE followers_count > 100;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, followers_count FROM users WHERE followers_count > 100 ORDER BY followers_count DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT username, followers_count, user_id FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY followers_count ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, followers_count FROM users ORDER BY followers_count DESC, username ASC;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like' AND interaction_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_interactions > 5 ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE followers_count > 100;
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM posts WHERE post_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE post_id = 12345;
SELECT username, followers_count, interactions_count FROM users ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, followers_count FROM users WHERE followers_count > 100 ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT post_id, user_id, post_content FROM posts WHERE LENGTH(post_content) > 100 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(post_id) AS total_posts FROM posts GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_posts > 10;
SELECT username, SUM(interactions_count) AS total_interactions FROM users GROUP BY username HAVING total_interactions > 500;

SELECT interactions.interaction_id, interactions.user_id, interactions.interaction_type, posts.post_content FROM interactions INNER JOIN posts ON interactions.post_id = posts.post_id ORDER BY interactions.interaction_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, followers_count FROM users WHERE interactions_count > 100;
SELECT post_content, created_at FROM posts ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, count(*) AS num_interactions FROM interactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT users.username, followers.follower_user_id FROM users JOIN followers ON users.user_id = followers.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE followers_count > 100 ORDER BY interactions_count DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, followers_count FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY followers_count ASC;
SELECT * FROM posts WHERE user_id = 1 AND created_at >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY post_id DESC;

SELECT users.username, interactions.interaction_type FROM users INNER JOIN interactions ON users.user_id = interactions.user_id WHERE interactions.interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY users.username ASC;
SELECT users.username, followers.follower_user_id FROM users INNER JOIN followers ON users.user_id = followers.user_id WHERE followers.follower_user_id = 5 ORDER BY users.username DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, num_followers FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM interactions JOIN users ON interactions.user_id = users.user_id;
SELECT interaction_id, action_type, timestamp FROM interactions WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, num_followers FROM influencer_users ORDER BY num_followers DESC;
SELECT username, num_followers FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, num_followers FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM followers WHERE follower_id = 3;
SELECT username, action_type, timestamp FROM influencer_users INNER JOIN influencer_interactions ON influencer_users.user_id = influencer_interactions.user_id WHERE num_followers > 1000;
